publication.title: Writing about C++
publication.jconf: Conference of the Centre for Advanced Studies on Collaborative Research

publication.title: A development process for large multimedia titles
publication.jconf: ACM Special Interest Group for Design of Communication
publication.abstract: Within IBM there are many groups that have made small-scale multimedia titles. Large titles, however, are not so common. This paper describes the process that we followed to create a large title, Experience C++. It begins with a description of why we decided to create a multimedia title about C++. It then describes the process that we followed to make
